description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Vegetable Salad & Crispy Tofu recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Grain salad,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Low saturated fat,Roast,Low salt,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Zucchini,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Tofu
name: Roasted Vegetable Salad & Crispy Tofu Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red capsicum, deseeded, cut into 2cm strips
300g hard tofu, drained, cut into 1cm slices

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Cook barley as per packet instructions.

Place pumpkin and eggplant onto 1 tray and capsicum and zucchini on second tray. Spray vegetables well with oil and season. Roast for 20 minutes. Add tomatoes and roast for a further 20 minutes or until golden and tender.
Meanwhile, lightly coat tofu with cornflour. Heat 1 tbs oil in a nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Cook tofu for 2 minutes each side or until golden and crisp. Transfer to a plate.
Whisk remaining oil with vinegar, honey and mustard in a jug.
Spoon barley onto a platter, top with vegetables and tofu. Drizzle with dressing and sprinkle with pepitas, to serve.
